name: SCP: Site 62
description:
My entry for the Hack UTD game jam 2020.  I worked on this game alone.  The game is built in Unreal Engine 4, and makes use of Horror Engine Reloaded.  Main character voice acting is done by Ian Dalzell.  Ambient music is from SCP: Containment Breach.  

If you aren't familiar with SCP, I suggest you check it out.  The wiki is here.  SCP is held under share alike creative commons license, and thus so is this game.  It is free to download and distribute, but please give credit.
